overview: SHAY: ALL AMERICAN GIRL is a heartwarming and sexy tribute to youth growing up in America. Scott presents Shay Jordan with a lovely birthday cake, only to have his c*ck dipped in the frosting and her sweet p*ssy. Gorgeous Addison Rose diddles herself while sucking on a bouquet of tantalizing lollipops. Karlie Montana and Shay share more than their hot dogs in a splendid girl/girl discovery scene. Ben English knocks Sammy Cruz off her rocking horse and she thoroughly enjoys the fall. Neveah enlists Shay in a game of patty-cake but Shay has something else in mind. Scott and Angeline Marie get all tied up in a licorice feeding frenzy while Shay bathes with some light up rubber duckies. In the finale, Shay shows her true American passion in a fantastic first-date scene with Marco and an everchanging Dodge Super Bee. Digital Playground`s All-American Girl series casts a vibrant, sexy light on America`s favorite pastimes and the sexy girls who enjoy them.
title: Shay Jordan: All American Girl
